sentences: Küll on õudne, kui lapsuke ema kätel surma vaagub ja sa aidata ei oska!
.. ja hobuste jalgade alla tallatud inimesed vaakusid surma ..
context: The word 'surma' is the genitive singular and partitive singular form of 'surm', meaning death. It can indicate possession related to death (of death), describe something being in the process of dying, or indicate movement toward death.
